paragraphs: You step onto the stage. The amber light swallows you whole.
For a moment, there is only sensation—the weight of eyes you cannot see, the electricity of a story about to begin, the vastness of a darkness that holds infinite possibilities.
Then the light fades, and you understand.

This is not an ending. It is the prologue to a story that has waited since the first word was written. The Understage stretches before you, a labyrinth of narratives nested within narratives, of characters seeking completion, of stories that demand to be told.
You are the Prompter. And your work has only begun.
Thank you for experiencing The Understage vertical slice. You have witnessed:
- Inventory gating (the iron door, the booth key)
The full game will expand from this foundation—multiple acts, factions, endings, and the deeper mystery of the Editor who controls them all.
Story continues in Act 1: The Breach...

ending.title: The Threshold Crossed
ending.description: You have crossed the threshold and entered the Understage.
